description: The Light Sul is, by all measures and standards, pretty average for a carrier. The reason for its obvious shortcomings can be found in the limited budget available to the PMC advisory board during the design phase of this ship. The reason for the then low budget was the uncertaintly on how the resources of Albion would support a stranded population and their infrastructure. With PMC now dominant, the Light Sul continues to play a major role in consolidating their position of power.
name: Light Sul
